name: CLIMB UP HIGH
description:
JUMP!
Jumping up is what you do! From platform to platform over rocks and bridges all the way to the top!

STORY
One day on a routine trip you crashed your spaceship on an unexpected obstacle and were thrown out of the cockpit. You flew aaaaall the way down to the bottom and landed on a beach. That's where your journey begins to climb back up and recover your vehicle so you can get back home!

STATE
This is a personal project I work on it during my spare time so the state of the game is still heavily work-in-progress so many things will change along the way. Nevertheless I would appreciate some feedback and want to hear what you like or dislike so far. I am no game dev but like to try something new with this game.

> The game has currently only one short level
> Don't be afraid to leave a comment below and give any suggestions!

CREDITS
Some placeholder assets are from Kenny on https://opengameart.org
